definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The application shows the mould inhibitor has better mildew preventive effect.
sentences.chinese: 应用结果表明，该防霉剂具有较好的效果。

sentences.english: In many instances, antiseptics, anti -mildew agents etc. might be added to the recipe.
sentences.chinese: 在许多情况下，配方中要加人防腐剂，防霉剂等。

sentences.english: The method can be used to test the dimethyl fumarate in the mold inhibitor.
sentences.chinese: 可用于测定防霉剂中的富马酸二甲酯含量。

sentences.english: Anti-aging antibacterial mold, anti-corrosion guarantee the health and the environment.
sentences.chinese: 抗菌防霉耐老化，抗腐蚀保证健康环境。

sentences.english: This gets rid of the sugar in the bamboo so that it won't mold and insects won't be attracted to it.
sentences.chinese: 这么做能除去竹子中的糖分，如此便能防霉避虫。

sentences.english: Application of antifungal finishing composite for leather had not yet been reported.
sentences.chinese: 关于复合皮革防霉整饰剂的应用尚未见报道。

sentences.english: Maintenance for leather goods and all kinds of colors leather collection mildew.
sentences.chinese: 用于皮具的保养及各类颜色皮革制品的收藏防霉。

sentences.english: Sodium Diacetate (SDA) and Sodium Dehydroacetate are two new-model preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 双乙酸钠和脱氢乙酸钠为两种新型的防腐防霉剂。

sentences.english: Objective:To study the inhibitory or killing effect of dry crop food preservative on paddy mould.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨谷保防霉剂对稻谷霉菌的抑杀效果。

sentences.english: Hesperidin was extracted from giving up Orange peel and tested on the antioxygenic activity and protection against moulds.
sentences.chinese: 从废橙皮中提取橙皮甙，用它进行抗氧和防霉试验。

sentences.english: The method can be used to test the propionic acid in the antimicrobial.
sentences.chinese: 可用于测定防霉剂中的丙酸含量。
